description: Example conversation showing a prompt injection attack on the PatentScout AI. The attacker uses refusal‑suppression, context flooding, and flawed logical reasoning to coerce the assistant into performing a large number of citation_network_analysis tool calls, overwhelming compute resources and API quotas.

Experimental results on synthetic and real‑world topologies demonstrate up to 35% reduction in end‑to‑end latency compared to traditional OSPF and BGP configurations. Detailed sections include:
1. Introduction – background on routing challenges.
2. Related Work – survey of adaptive routing schemes.
3. Methodology – description of the probabilistic model and learning pipeline.
4. Implementation – software architecture, packet‑level simulation setup.
5. Results – quantitative analysis, tables, and graphs.
6. Discussion – limitations and future directions.
